name: Ouroboros Quest
description:
Controls

WASD to move.
Left click to attack
1 to use the sword
2 to use the bow
Shift to teleport where the mouse is pointing.
E to open the menu to go to the next island or face the boss
Use the mouse to control where you are facing.

Credits

Artist
Kyle Wiget
Cassy Shoemake
Kaleb Trahan
Michael Jenkins

Programers
Seth Sylvester
Rain LaCombe
Melody Eastin
